version_description: Minor bug fixes & improvements.
Minor bug fixes & improvements.

- Team feature is now live:
Create your own team or join others.
Complete team boxes and earn prizes.
Duel and chat with your friends in team.
- Bug fixes and improvements.

Head Ball 2 is better than ever with the latest update. Here's some of the cool stuff that comes with the new update;

- Added the option to replay Career matches by watching video ads up to a certain number of times.

- Feeling lucky ? Let's

The BIGGEST update ever in Head Ball 2 history is here!

Character Upgrade
- Upgrade your characters by collecting required number of cards and get stronger!
- Change your characters' skins by upgrading them, increase their stats and put fear

Download this brand new update for a better Head Ball 2 experience!

- Brand new feature "Player of the Match" is here! Try to avoid red cards and win awesome rewards!

- Bug fixes and optimizations.

New in this release;

- Career Mode is here: Collect characters and accessories, progress in career mode and unlock exclusive rewards and benefits! Two exclusive characters and +500% Fan Boost are waiting for the best Head Ball 2 players. Career Mod
- Minor bug fixes and improvements.
- Minor bug fixes and improvements.

- “Equalize Character Powers” option added to Friendly Matches.
- Minor bug fixes and improvements.
- Minor bug fixes and improvements.

Player of the Match improvements

- Jackpot step improvements including better rewards and visuals.
